emails.text: Dear Valued Customer, Your account has been temporarily suspended due to suspicious login attempts. To restore access immediately, please verify your identity by clicking the link below: http://secure-bank-verify.com/restore-account Failure to verify within 24 hours will result in permanent account closure. Thank you, Security Team
emails.subject: URGENT: Account Security Alert - Action Required

emails.text: Hi team, Please find attached the Q3 performance report for your review. We'll discuss this in our meeting on Friday at 2:00 PM. Best regards, Sarah Johnson Project Manager
emails.subject: Q3 Performance Report Review

emails.text: CONGRATULATIONS! You've been selected as the winner of our $50,000 Grand Prize! To claim your prize, please click the link below and complete the verification form: http://prize-claim-center.com/winner-verify You must respond within 48 hours to receive your prize. This is a limited time offer!
emails.subject: You're Our $50,000 Winner!

emails.text: Hello John, Just checking in about our lunch meeting tomorrow. Does 12:30 PM at the usual place work for you? Looking forward to catching up. Cheers, Michael
emails.subject: Lunch Meeting Tomorrow

emails.text: IMPORTANT: Your password will expire in 24 hours. To maintain access to your account, you must update your password immediately. Click here to reset: http://password-reset-security.com/update Failure to update will result in account suspension. IT Support Center
emails.subject: Password Expiration Notice

emails.text: Dear Employee, This is a reminder about the upcoming company-wide training session scheduled for next Tuesday at 10:00 AM in the main conference room. Please bring your laptop and employee handbook. Regards, HR Department
emails.subject: Company Training Session Reminder

emails.text: Your recent transaction of $1,250.00 seems unusual. If you did not authorize this payment, please verify your account immediately: http://secure-banking-alert.com/confirm-identity We've temporarily restricted your account for security purposes.
emails.subject: Unusual Activity Detected on Your Account

emails.text: Hi everyone, The office will be closed next Monday for maintenance. All employees should work remotely. Please ensure you have VPN access set up. Thanks, Facilities Management
emails.subject: Office Closure Notice - Next Monday

emails.text: Your package delivery is pending. Due to an incorrect address, we cannot deliver your shipment. Please update your delivery information here: http://package-delivery-update.com/verify-address You have 12 hours to confirm or your package will be returned.
emails.subject: Package Delivery Issue - Action Required

emails.text: Hello, Your monthly subscription newsletter is now available. This month's edition includes: - Industry trends and insights - Upcoming webinars and events - New feature releases You can access it here: https://company.com/newsletter Best, The Team
emails.subject: Monthly Newsletter Available

emails.text: We've detected a login to your account from a new device in a different location. If this was you, you can ignore this message. If this wasn't you, please secure your account immediately: http://account-protection-security.com/verify Device: iPhone 14 Location: Moscow, Russia Time: 2:30 AM
emails.subject: New Sign-In Detected

emails.text: Dear Customer, Your invoice #INV-2024-5876 for $245.50 is now due. Please make payment by the end of the week to avoid late fees. You can pay online through our secure portal: https://billing.company.com/pay Thank you for your business. Accounting Department
emails.subject: Invoice Payment Reminder

emails.text: Limited Time Offer: Get 85% OFF all premium medications! No prescription required. Fast worldwide shipping. Complete privacy guaranteed. Visit: http://global-meds-discount.com/special-offer Our customers love us: 'Best service ever! - John D.'
emails.subject: Special Medical Offer - 85% OFF

emails.text: Hi team, I wanted to share some positive feedback we received from our client regarding the recent project delivery. They were particularly impressed with the attention to detail and timely communication. Great work everyone! Let's keep up the momentum. Best, David Smith Department Head
emails.subject: Positive Client Feedback

emails.text: Your tax refund of $1,285 is ready for processing. However, we need additional verification to release your funds. Please confirm your banking details and social security number here: http://tax-refund-verification.com/secure-update This is time-sensitive - respond within 6 hours. IRS Processing Center
emails.subject: Tax Refund Processing - Verification Required

emails.text: Reminder: The deadline for submitting timesheets is Friday at 5:00 PM. Please ensure all your hours are accurately recorded. Late submissions may delay payroll processing. Thank you, Payroll Department
emails.subject: Timesheet Submission Deadline

emails.text: You have unclaimed Bitcoin worth approximately $8,450! Our records show you qualified for this cryptocurrency reward program. To claim your Bitcoin, you must verify your wallet address and pay a small processing fee of $50. Click here to claim: http://bitcoin-rewards-program.com/claim-limited-offer Don't miss this opportunity!
emails.subject: Unclaimed Bitcoin Reward - Act Now!

emails.text: Hello, I'm following up on our conversation last week about the marketing campaign. I've attached the initial draft for your review. Please let me know if you'd like to schedule a call to discuss any changes. Looking forward to your feedback. Best, Jennifer Lee Marketing Coordinator
emails.subject: Follow-up: Marketing Campaign Draft

emails.text: URGENT SECURITY ALERT: Multiple failed login attempts detected on your account from unknown locations. We've temporarily locked your account for security. To restore access, you must verify your identity immediately: http://account-recovery-security.com/verify-now This is critical to prevent unauthorized access. Security Operations Center
emails.subject: CRITICAL: Account Security Breach Detected

emails.text: The team meeting scheduled for tomorrow has been moved from Conference Room A to Conference Room B due to maintenance work. The time remains the same at 9:00 AM. Please update your calendars accordingly. We apologize for any inconvenience. Facilities Team
emails.subject: Meeting Room Change - Tomorrow
